Blue Bot Documentation

Let's see how things work!

Bot Configuration (/config)

The /config command allows you to configure different features on your server and set them to specific channels. The syntax for the command is as follows:

/config ⟨feature⟩ ⟨channel⟩

The following features are supported:

Command Subcommand Description
/config
AutoMod configures the AutoMod feature.
Filter configures the Filter feature.
Welcome configures the Welcome feature.
/data
Get retrieves the data we have collected on your server.
Delete deletes all of the data collected on your server.
/help
responds with a list of supported commands
